entry.title: Friday: Rain or drizzle. High 9.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to rain or drizzle near noon. Fog patches developing near noon. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 10 February 2023
